h: Woman, son killed in Road accident
8 accidents/day in Bhopal
sub_h: As many as 2,788 Road accidents took place in Bhopal during 2022 as per the data maintained by city traffic police. It means that eight Road accidents were reported to police each day during the year. Traffic police have identified 12 black spots (accident-prone spots) after analysing the data of last three years from 2020 to 2022.

h: Two killed in accidents across city in last 24 hours

h: Constable dies in Road accident

h: Seven injured in Road accident in Ratlam
sub_h: Seven persons were injured when a van they were travelling in was hit by an unidentified vehicle in industrial area of Ratlam on Tuesday .

h: 2 bros killed in Road accident

h: Koh-e-Fiza most accident prone area in Bhopal
sub_h: The Kohefiza area in Bhopal is a location where a lot of Road accidents happen. Twenty-three people have died in these accidents so far this year, which is the highest number of casualties in Road accidents reported at a police station during the period. Kohefiza is followed by Misrod Road in which 17 people lost their lives in s during the same period.

h: Dubious distinction: Bhopal records 4th highest Road accident deaths in India
sub_h: In India, the city of Bhopal is known for having a high rate of Road accidents due to overspeeding. The Union Ministry of Road Transport and Highways released a report on December 28 that showed that around 216 of the total 253 people that died on city roads in 2021 were linked to overspeeding. This increase was also seen in other years, with 2190 s being audited in the year.

h: Madhya Pradesh: Gunman dies in Road accident
sub_h: Gunman of a sub-divisional officer of police (SDOP) posted in Satna district died, while the officer had a narrow escape as their vehicle overturned after colliding head on with a jeep in neighbouring Uttar Pradesh.

h: Four injured in three accidents in Malwa-Nimar region
sub_h: A truck hit a loading vehicle from behind, injuring the driver and conductor of the loading vehicle. Locals rushed to the scene and informed the police. The truck driver left the vehicle behind and fled the scene. The police have seized the truck and registered a case of rash driving. In another accident, a man was injured and rushed to a private hospital. The police have registered cases in both accidents.

h: 4 dead after car rams into truck on highway in MP's Betul

h: Three killed, six injured in Road accident in Madhya Pradesh's Barwani district
sub_h: The collision caused the pick-up vehicle to overturn and trap the passengers, he said adding the larger vehicle fled the spot, leaving behind the victims, most of whom fell unconscious.

h: 1 killed, four injured in 2 Road accidents in Indore division
sub_h: A man was killed and four others were injured in two accidents in Indore Division on Monday morning. The first accident happened in Ratlam District when a couple riding a bike was hit by an earth mover from the front in Matwala village. The husband, Babulal Singar, died on the spot and his wife, Seeta Singar, was injured. Their child, Tejpal, had a close shave in the accident. Police said the family residents of Banswara District in Rajasthan were traveling from Barkheda to Bajna when the accident took place. They were rushed to hospital by their relatives traveling with them on another vehicle. Doctors declared Babulal dead and Seeta was admitted for treatment. Police said Rawati Police Station incharge, Patiram Rawate, told TOI, "The death has been recorded and the earth mover has been seized. The investigations further in the matter are ongoing." In another accident, three youths were injured after being hit by a crane around 4 am in Burhanpur. They were admitted to a private hospital for treatment. Police said the injured were identified as Abhilash Kumar 26, Anil Gadhe 26, and Ajay Ghete 28. They were returning

h: Three die in Bhopal Road accidents
sub_h: A speeding bike-borne man allegedly into two women walking ahead in front of Lal Parade Ground in Jehangirabad locality on Wednesday evening. The collision was so intense that 19-year-old Savitri Dhurvey was thrown on the divider and she sustained severe head injuries.

Due to the impact, Bhuribai fell on the road and came under wheels of the tractor. She died on the spot, while her relative was unhurt.

Acting on information Berasia police registered a case against the errant bikerider and started the investigation.

h: Madhya Pradesh: Man on way to admit Covid positive father dies in accident
sub_h: A 28-year-old man and his car driver died in a Road accident in the city outskirts on Saturday morning. The man was coming from Uttar Pradesh to admit his corona positive father, who was in a different car, in a hospital in Bhopal. The accident took place under the jurisdiction of Bilkheria police station on the Raisen road. Police said they were coming from Auraiya in UP and were going to a hospital in Shahpura. Investigating Officer ASI ML Dubey said that the deceased was identified as Ram, 28, a resident of Bidhuna town in UP’s Auraiya and the deceased driver was Deep Kumar, 26, a resident of Auraiya. Ram was a contractor.

h: Madhya Pradesh: 5 killed, 20 injured in 2 Road accidents in Rajgarh
sub_h: A case was registered against the truck driver and the vehicle was seized, the police said.

h: Madhya Pradesh second only to Tamil Nadu in number of Road accidents: NCRB

Overall, 53,379 Road accidents were reported in MP, second only to Tamil Nadu, which reported 59,499 s. Even more populous states like Uttar Pradesh and Bihar reported far lesser s than MP.

sub_h: The accident took place at around 4.15 am when the jeep rammed into a stationary truck parked along the road at Alonia toll plaza on Jabalpur-Nagpur Highway, 22 km from district headquarters, said Dilip Pancheshwar, in-charge of Bandol police station.

h: Two killed in Ujjain Road accident
sub_h: Two persons were killed and a 10-year-old boy was injured when a motorcycle they were riding on, was hit by a speeding truck at Bherugarh Square in Ujjain on Wednesday.

h: Four killed in Road accident in Madhya Pradesh
sub_h: Four persons were killed and two others injured on Sunday after an MUV collided with a motorcycle and a scooter near Bhopal in Madhya Pradesh, police said.

h: Three family members, their two relatives killed in Madhya Pradesh Road accident
sub_h: A couple, their two-year- old daughter and two relatives were killed after their car was hit by a truck at Tejgati village near here on Sunday, police said.

h: Madhya Pradesh: 24-year-old injured in Khajuri crash dies in hospital
4 national-level hockey players killed in MP car crash
sub_h: Four players of Madhya Pradesh hockey academy were killed in a road mishap near Hoshangabad on Monday morning. Three other players were injured in the incident.

h: Four of a family killed in Road accident in MP's Sendhwa
4 dead in Sagar Road accident
sub_h: Four persons were killed and two injured in a road mishap in Sagar district in the early hours of Thursday.

h: Truck driving on wrong side hits bike, couple dead
sub_h: A couple from Ujjain died in Road accident at Navlakha Road Square on Friday, when truck coming from the wrong end hit their bike. The deceased have been identified as Sunil Kumawat, 43 and his wife Sarita aged around 40. “We have registered case under section 304 of IPC for culpable homicide not amounting to murder against the driver and seized the vehicles,” police station in charge Narendra Singh Raghuwanshi said. The search for accused driver was on and he will be nabbed soon, he added.

h: Eight home-bound migrants killed in Road accidents in Madhya Pradesh
sub_h: Eight migrants including four women were killed in three separate Road accidents in Madhya Pradesh on Saturday, police said. At least 29 others were injured in these accidents which took place in Sagar, Guna and Barwani districts, police said.

h: 65-year-old killed in Road accident in Bhopal
sub_h: A 65-year-old man died in a Road accident on Thursday. Eitkhedi police registered a case against unidentified accused and started investigation.

h: ‘580 women bikers died in Road accidents in 4 yrs’
Helmetless youth dead, friend injured in Bhopal
sub_h: A 20-year-old bike-borne youth who was riding without a helmet died and his friend sustained severe injuries after a speeding car hit their bike at EOW Office Square in MP Nagar locality on Tuesday late night.

h: Bullets fly in Budhwara to protest Road accident
sub_h: Panic gripped Budhwara after an alleged sword-wielding mob fired shots in the air and pelted stones at vehicles after a dispute over a minor Road accident. Locals gathered at the spot and staged a protest, demanding strict police action against the goons.

h: MP: 12 dead in head-on collision between two cars in Ujjain
Madhya Pradesh: 9 killed in bus-truck collision in Rewa
sub_h: At least nine people were killed while 10 others suffered injuries in a head-on collision between a private bus and a truck near Rewa city in Madhya Pradesh on Thursday.

h: Madhya Pradesh: Couple, 2 daughters killed, 3 injured in Road accident
sub_h: A couple and their two minor daughters were killed and three others injured on Sunday after an oil tanker overturned and hit their motorcycle at Badi Bijasan Ghat on Madhya Pradesh-Maharashtra border, police said.

h: Businessman killed after being hit by four-wheeler driven by minor
Bhopal Roads: 1 dead every two days
sub_h: Blame it on the speeding bikes zipping around the city streets or the poor design of roads and intersections, at least one person is killed in a Road accident every second day in the state capital.

h: Six killed in an accident in Dhar district
